metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart confronts Viconia about her past and potentially the leadership of the cult itself. Alternatively, she may just seek to fight her former mistress in order to free her parents, should she know they're alive.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Enter the grotto with Shadowheart as avatar or just with Shadowheart2. Approach Viconia3. Dialog starts

2.speaker: Viconia DeVir
2.text: They already heard how you disgraced yourself before Lady Shar. How she marked you as the enemy. But it is quite another thing for them to see it for themselves.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia awaits SH. A sharran audience in the wings murmurs their disgust as SH appears

134.speaker: Viconia DeVir
134.text: I am very glad you decided to return. A cautionary tale such as yours will be studied by Lady Shar's initiates for years to come.
134.context: NodeContext: Cautioning - reference to how the player attacked an illusion of Viconia earlier while not aware it wasn't actually her.

84.speaker: Viconia DeVir
84.text: Now, do not be so foolish as to attack me. Unlike before, I am flesh and blood - but am very well protected.
84.context: NodeContext: Cautioning - reference to how the player attacked an illusion of Viconia earlier while not aware it wasn't actually her.

99.speaker: Viconia DeVir
99.text: But perhaps I can make a case for some small measure of mercy. Give me the artefact, and I can at least make this quick.
99.context: CinematicNodeContext: Raised eyebrow in reaction to what SH just said. Small sweep of her right hand at the general surrounds.NodeContext: Raised eyebrow to betray a little surprise that Shadowheart is aware her parents are alive. Small sweep of her right hand at the general surrounds. Referring to the onlooking Shar worshippers

170.speaker: Shadowheart
170.text: I don't answer to you. Not anymore. I'm here for my family.
170.context: CinematicNodeContext: Raised eyebrow in reaction to what SH just said. Small sweep of her right hand at the general surrounds.NodeContext: Raised eyebrow to betray a little surprise that Shadowheart is aware her parents are alive. Small sweep of her right hand at the general surrounds. Referring to the onlooking Shar worshippers

155.speaker: Viconia DeVir
155.text: This is your family. And now you have turned your back on it.
155.context: CinematicNodeContext: Raised eyebrow in reaction to what SH just said. Small sweep of her right hand at the general surrounds.NodeContext: Raised eyebrow to betray a little surprise that Shadowheart is aware her parents are alive. Small sweep of her right hand at the general surrounds. Referring to the onlooking Shar worshippers

149.speaker: Narrator
149.text: *You knew it would come to this. Yet still, your heart races: Viconia DeVir. Your mentor. Onetime mother figure. And now, your foe.*
149.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH tense expression/Viconia glowering expressionNodeContext: Vy-cone-eeh-ah De-Veer

158.speaker: Viconia DeVir
158.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gestures for her followers to attackNodeContext: Battle cry. l-ill allure

163.speaker: Shadowheart
163.text: No. It will never be yours.

156.speaker: Viconia DeVir
156.text: You'll surrender it soon enough, once your last breath escapes you.

148.speaker: Shadowheart
148.text: Why do you even want the artefact so badly? Tell me the truth, at least this once.

62.speaker: Shadowheart
62.text: You're acting against Shar. She'll damn you as quickly as she damned me.

13.speaker: Shadowheart
13.text: You sent us against the Absolute? The githyanki? It was a suicide mission from the start.

19.speaker: Viconia DeVir
19.text: I thought you might try to flee, rather than face us. Perhaps you are braver than I thought - or more arrogant than even I can fathom.
19.context: NodeContext: Cautioning - reference to how the player attacked an illusion of Viconia earlier while not aware it wasn't actually her.

130.speaker: Viconia DeVir
130.text: No matter. You are here now, to face the Dark Lady's judgement, before a gathering of your peers. Give the artefact, and perhaps we will be merciful.
130.context: NodeContext: Cautioning - reference to how the player attacked an illusion of Viconia earlier while not aware it wasn't actually her.

29.speaker: Viconia DeVir
29.text: And do not be so foolish as to attack me again. Unlike before, I am flesh and blood - but am very well protected.
29.context: NodeContext: Cautioning - reference to how the player attacked an illusion of Viconia earlier while not aware it wasn't actually her.

20.speaker: Shadowheart
20.text: You've finally found yourself a following, Mother Superior. And you only had to hollow out their heads to do it.
20.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

72.speaker: Shadowheart
72.text: You've finally found yourself a following, Mother Superior. And you only had to hollow out their heads to do it.
72.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

61.speaker: Jaheira
61.text: You've finally found yourself a following, Mother Superior. And you only had to hollow out their heads to do it.
61.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

150.speaker: Minsc
150.text: Pin your eyes to the treacherous she-drow. Do not focus on the many, many others - Boo will handle them.
150.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

57.speaker: Viconia DeVir
57.text: Always a pleasure to see old acquaintances. But you would be wise to not interfere in this matter.
57.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

7.speaker: Shadowheart
7.text: No. Lady Shar has chosen me to cleanse her ranks - you no longer have her blessing.
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Watching sharrans react with disquiet, murmuring amongst themselves.

53.speaker: Shadowheart
53.text: No. Lady Shar has chosen me to cleanse her ranks - you no longer have her blessing.
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Watching sharrans react with disquiet, murmuring amongst themselves.

14.speaker: Shadowheart
14.text: No. Lady Shar has chosen me to cleanse her ranks - you no longer have her blessing.
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Watching sharrans react with disquiet, murmuring amongst themselves.

82.speaker: Viconia DeVir
82.text: Nonsense. Ravings. You've strayed, girl - you've failed Lady Shar's mission and allowed ambition to rot your mind.
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Watching sharrans react with disquiet, murmuring amongst themselves.

133.speaker: Shadowheart
133.text: The artefact is too powerful for you. The mission cannot be fulfilled. Lady Shar wishes for me to take your place.
133.context: CinematicNodeContext: Watching sharrans react with disquiet, murmuring amongst themselves.NodeContext: First section directed at onlooking Sharrans, last line directed at shadowheart

18.speaker: Viconia DeVir
18.text: Do you hear these delusions? She defies my command. She thinks she knows better - she thinks she is better. But you will soon learn otherwise, girl.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Watching sharrans react with disquiet, murmuring amongst themselves.NodeContext: First section directed at onlooking Sharrans, last line directed at shadowheart

33.speaker: Viconia DeVir
33.text: But please, continue - dig your own grave. It shall make for a fine lesson to all gathered before us.
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

112.speaker: Viconia DeVir
112.text: But please, continue - dig your own grave. It shall make for a fine lesson to all gathered before us.
112.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

117.speaker: Shadowheart
117.text: I survived the Gauntlet of Shar. I sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. I am your rightful leader.
117.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

107.speaker: Shadowheart
107.text: I walked through the depths of Lady Shar's darkness, where others feared to venture. I am favoured.
107.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

69.speaker: Viconia DeVir
69.text: A true Sharran like you must be on the right side.
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

49.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
49.text: A true Sharran like you must be on the right side.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sharrans' murmurs grow more animated. One shouts out in support.NodeContext: Supportive, swayed by the player's argument

36.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Nightmist
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: A group of sharrans move to Shadowheart's back.NodeContext: Swearing fealty (having just changed sides to support the player)

103.speaker: Viconia DeVir
103.text: So be it. A traitor's end awaits you all. These are the desperate lies of trapped vermin, nothing more. You are moon-sick, girl. A true lunatic.
103.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia watches angrily as some followers change sides, then decries them and shadowheart to all assembled.NodeContext: First part (up to 'awaits you all') addressed to Sharrans who have abandoned her. Middle (up to 'nothing more' addressed to her remaining supporters. Last part directed at shadowheart.

92.speaker: Shadowheart
92.text: Urge the onlookers to heed Lady Shar - she speaks to you. She has chosen you.
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Another group of Sharrans break from the fold and side with Shadowheart. There is perhaps now an even split between the two. Viconia lambasts those who changed sides.

100.speaker: Viconia DeVir
100.text: The traitors' ranks swell - much like a corpse left under the sun. I will take joy in making each and every one of you suffer.
100.context: CinematicNodeContext: Another group of Sharrans break from the fold and side with Shadowheart. There is perhaps now an even split between the two. Viconia lambasts those who changed sides.

86.speaker: Viconia DeVir
86.text: The traitors' ranks swell - much like a corpse left under the sun. I will take joy in making each and every one of you suffer.
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: Another group of Sharrans break from the fold and side with Shadowheart. There is perhaps now an even split between the two. Viconia lambasts those who changed sides.

118.speaker: Viconia DeVir
118.text: Enough talk, girl. The sooner we finish this, the sooner your blood can be sluiced off Lady Shar's sacred Grotto.
118.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheat raises her right hand, which glows with the power of her Shar-given magic from the incurable wound in her palm - a black sphere of sharran magic, balanced above the wound. (Same as how it appeared on UUID 80fe690a-0c7e-9292-5888-9d49e6de3e58 of SHA_NightsongsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM). Shadowheart looks defiant, powerful. Awed murmurs can be heard from the assembled Sharrans.The last of Viconia's followers shuffle away from her. Viconia looks at them with disgust before turning her attention back to Shadowheart.

81.speaker: Shadowheart
81.text: Show the holdouts the power that Lady Shar has blessed you with.
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheat raises her right hand, which glows with the power of her Shar-given magic from the incurable wound in her palm - a black sphere of sharran magic, balanced above the wound. (Same as how it appeared on UUID 80fe690a-0c7e-9292-5888-9d49e6de3e58 of SHA_NightsongsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM). Shadowheart looks defiant, powerful. Awed murmurs can be heard from the assembled Sharrans.The last of Viconia's followers shuffle away from her. Viconia looks at them with disgust before turning her attention back to Shadowheart.

0.text: No matter. I built this place from nothing - I can always start anew once you've been dealt with.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheat raises her right hand, which glows with the power of her Shar-given magic from the incurable wound in her palm - a black sphere of sharran magic, balanced above the wound. (Same as how it appeared on UUID 80fe690a-0c7e-9292-5888-9d49e6de3e58 of SHA_NightsongsFate_OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM). Shadowheart looks defiant, powerful. Awed murmurs can be heard from the assembled Sharrans.The last of Viconia's followers shuffle away from her. Viconia looks at them with disgust before turning her attention back to Shadowheart.

26.speaker: Viconia DeVir
26.text: No matter. I built this place from nothing - I can always start anew once you've been dealt with.

3.speaker: Viconia DeVir
3.text: You were right about one thing. Lady Shar's church does need to be cleansed - of you. And by my hand.

47.speaker: Shadowheart
47.text: Tell me one thing at least, before we end this - why did you want the artefact?
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gestures for her followers to attackNodeContext: Battle cry. l-ill allure

71.speaker: Shadowheart
71.text: Lady Shar didn't ask you to do this. You betrayed her - pursued your own goals.

15.speaker: Shadowheart
15.text: You sent us against the Absolute? The githyanki? It was a suicide mission from the start.

116.speaker: Shadowheart
116.text: You've heard enough. Show the holdouts the power that Lady Shar has blessed you with.

75.speaker: Shadowheart
75.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gestures for her followers to attackNodeContext: Battle cry. l-ill allure

159.speaker: Viconia DeVir
159.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gestures for her followers to attackNodeContext: Battle cry. l-ill allure

94.text: The Absolute will be dealt with. As soon as I prise the artefact from your cold fingers.
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: The onlooking Sharrans are unimpressed - none join Shadowheart's side. Viconia smiles and speaks to them.

164.speaker: Viconia DeVir
164.text: The Absolute will be dealt with. As soon as I prise the artefact from your cold fingers.
164.context: CinematicNodeContext: The onlooking Sharrans are unimpressed - none join Shadowheart's side. Viconia smiles and speaks to them.

102.speaker: Viconia DeVir
102.text: It seems your gambit is failing, girl. It would have been better if you had stayed away, stayed hidden.

139.speaker: Shadowheart
139.text: Tell the onlookers of the powers that Lady Shar has gifted you. Either they join you or face oblivion.

146.speaker: Shadowheart
146.text: Urge the onlookers to heed Lady Shar - she speaks to you. She has chosen you.

59.speaker: Shadowheart
59.text: Urge the onlookers to heed Lady Shar - she speaks to you. She has chosen you.

22.speaker: Shadowheart
22.text: Tell the onlookers of the powers that Lady Shar has gifted you. Either they join you or face oblivion.

74.speaker: Shadowheart
74.text: Tell the onlookers of the powers that Lady Shar has gifted you. Either they join you or face oblivion.

70.speaker: Shadowheart
70.text: Urge the onlookers to heed Lady Shar - she speaks to you. She has chosen you.

105.speaker: Shadowheart
105.text: Tell the onlookers of the powers that Lady Shar has gifted you. Either they join you or face oblivion.

23.text: It seems none answer your call.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: The onlooking Sharrans are unimpressed - none join Shadowheart's side. Viconia smiles and speaks to them.NodeContext: Taunting

73.speaker: Viconia DeVir
73.text: It seems none answer your call.
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: The onlooking Sharrans are unimpressed - none join Shadowheart's side. Viconia smiles and speaks to them.NodeContext: Taunting

68.speaker: Shadowheart
68.text: I walked through the depths of Lady Shar's darkness, where others feared to venture. I am favoured.

64.speaker: Shadowheart
64.text: I walked through the depths of Lady Shar's darkness, where others feared to venture. I am favoured.

79.speaker: Shadowheart
79.text: I survived the Gauntlet of Shar. I sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. I am your rightful leader.

54.speaker: Shadowheart
54.text: I survived the Gauntlet of Shar. I sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. I am your rightful leader.

48.speaker: Shadowheart
48.text: I survived the Gauntlet of Shar. I sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. I am your rightful leader.

115.speaker: Shadowheart
115.text: I walked through the depths of Lady Shar's darkness, where others feared to venture. I am favoured.

38.speaker: Shadowheart
38.text: Why do you even want the artefact so badly? Tell me the truth, at least this once.
38.context: NodeContext: Cruel smirk. 'Fine, I'll humour you briefly.'

5.speaker: Viconia DeVir
5.text: You always were too inquisitive for your own good - no matter how much I disciplined you. Very well - one little indulgence, before you face your reckoning.
5.context: NodeContext: Cruel smirk. 'Fine, I'll humour you briefly.'

9.speaker: Viconia DeVir
9.text: Whispers reached my ears from all corners - potential rivals of Lady Shar, all vying for the same prize. A new god, amassing the disaffected, the outcasts - those who should turn to us.
9.context: NodeContext: Note of anger at the end - the Absolute is encrouching on her goddess's territory

145.speaker: Viconia DeVir
145.text: This 'Absolute' is but an upstart; disturbing the natural order and threatening to impede the glorious return of Lady Shar's pure, endless darkness.

43.speaker: Viconia DeVir
43.text: I had to act. I had to strangle that foul conspiracy while it was still in the cradle.

56.speaker: Viconia DeVir
56.text: We learned all we could - the artefact was the one thing the Absolutists feared. The one thing they desperately wanted to keep out of their enemies' grasp. I had to have it.

167.speaker: Shadowheart
167.text: Lady Shar didn't ask you to do this. You betrayed her - pursued your own goals.
167.context: NodeContext: Hint of tension between her and her goddess. Their goals aren't aligned

93.speaker: Viconia DeVir
93.text: Lady Shar is a goddess... she can afford to ignore that which does not threaten her.
93.context: NodeContext: Hint of tension between her and her goddess. Their goals aren't aligned

21.speaker: Viconia DeVir
21.text: I must keep her faith alive in mortal hearts. I must defend her ways, lead her children, stop all threats. Even if I must go against her wishes, I will prove myself her most loyal servant.

31.speaker: Viconia DeVir
31.text: You will not prevail here. But you may survive - if you give me the artefact.

96.speaker: Shadowheart
96.text: You sent us against the Absolute? The githyanki? It was a suicide mission from the start.

129.speaker: Viconia DeVir
129.text: You speak as though your life was not already forfeit. All that you are belongs to the Dark Lady, and in the end, she will take it all back. The only question is when.

121.speaker: Viconia DeVir
121.text: But the mission was our best chance - to fight so many foes openly could prove unwise. Shar's children are better deployed as daggers in the shadows, not massed upon a battlefield.

16.speaker: Viconia DeVir
16.text: So let the others fight, while we wait. Once they are spent and bloodied from each other, we would slip in and take the prize. Alas, all perished. All but you.

113.speaker: Viconia DeVir
113.text: Then answer me - where is the artefact?

124.speaker: Shadowheart
124.text: No. Lady Shar has chosen me to cleanse her ranks - you no longer have her blessing.
124.context: NodeContext: Addressing all the onlooking Shar followers in the hall

32.speaker: Shadowheart
32.text: I survived the Gauntlet of Shar. I sacrificed Selûne's own daughter. I am your rightful leader.
32.context: NodeContext: Addressing all the onlooking Shar followers in the hall

41.speaker: Shadowheart
41.text: The threat of the Absolute is upon you all - and Viconia is not fit to lead you!

171.speaker: Shadowheart
171.text: I don't answer to you. Not anymore. I'm here for my family.
